abilities.desc: At the start of your turn, you gain 1 Power token and 1 Iron token.
abilities.trigger: at the start of your turn

abilities.desc: After you spend Power tokens, you gain 1 Speed token.
After you spend Iron tokens, you gain 1 Speed token.
When you discard Speed tokens at the end of each turn, you do not discard below 2 Speed tokens.
abilities.trigger: when you discard speed tokens at the end of each turn

actions.name: Think Fast!
actions.desc:
Target an enemy within range and Choose one: Give them 1 Weakness token; -or- give them 1 Fatigue token; -or- Push 3. Then, you may Move 2.
4 Basic Tokens: Choose two instead.
5 Basic Tokens: Choose three instead.
